name: Ping Pong (itch) (Aayan Yasin)
description:
This game is made in Pythons game library called Pygame.

This is an executable file i.e. ( .exe ) + 2 music + 1 icon.

You can play the game with arrow keys ( up, down) .

120 seconds to live, You should only survive to win.

Has 2 sounds :

  • 1st  is background music.
  • 2nd is hit sound.
